## Reading 

Before coming to lecture today, please read the following material:

## Homework Assignment

After you've completed the reading, but before coming to class, please complete the following homework assignment. Bring your responses to this assignment (handwritten or typed) to class on a piece of paper: 

-   For inference on one proportion, provide a detailed and accessible guide to doing statistical inference. Before writing out each step, make sure to motivate the task at hand (doing inference for a proportion). Make sure to write out all of the steps in the inference process for both the simulation-based method and theory-based method and describe when you might want to use one over the other.
